You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
More Easily Extend Certain Logic or Service Classes

Several methods in the B2B Commerce for Visualforce API call new logic or service providers. These changes simplify how you can extend or override default logic or service functionality for those methods.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: If you've created subscriber code that extends or overrides any affected methods, update your extensions to account for these changes.

CHANGE	UPGRADE IMPACT
B2B Commerce for Visualforce now calls the ccrz.ccLogicCategoryGetTree class instead of ccrz.cc_hk_Category for querying category tree data.	

For existing subscriber code that extends ccrz.cc_hk_Category, wrap calls to ccrz.cc_hk_Category using the ccrz.ccLogicCategoryGetTreeHk utility class.

Any new extensions for category tree queries must use ccrz.ccLogicCategoryGetTree.


The ccrz.ccApiCart class provides a new service class, ccrz.ccServiceCartItem, which replaces direct queries of cart items. When querying a parent cart, cart items are still placed under the parent cart. With the service class, you can query cart items directly, which allows for simpler extension.	

Methods of the ccrz.ccApiCart class no longer returns cart tier data.

Migrate any customizations for cart item direct queries to use the new service class.

The ccrz.ccApi.SZ_REL flag is still used to determine which cart subqueries and subservices to execute.


The ccrz.ccApiOrder class provides a new service class, ccrz.ccServiceOrderItems, replaces direct queries of order items. The ccrz.ccApiOrder.fetchOrderItems() method class this service class.	Migrate any customizations for order item direct queries to use the new service class.
SEE ALSO

(Salesforce Developers) ccrz.ccApiOrder
(Salesforce Developers) ccrz.ccLogicCategoryGetTree
(Salesforce Developers) ccrz.ccLogicCategoryGetTreeHk
